name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
title: Furina: Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!
in_play_description: When Furina, who has this card equipped, uses Salon Solitaire, she will apply Center of Attention to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Furina, equip this card. After Furina equips this card, immediately use Salon Solitaire once. When Furina, who has this card equipped, uses Salon Solitaire, she will apply Center of Attention to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state) (You must have Furina in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
